convolve.description: This function convolves two numpy arrays (1D, 2D, 3D).

coordinates.description: This function will return a ndarray corresponding to the coordinates array of the input.

correlate.description: This function correlates two numpy arrays (1D, 2D, 3D).

kernel.description: This funtion creates kernels small arrays, mainly for convolutions.

relabel.description: This function redefines a label array to fill potential holes inside.
